items.sentence: I just want to be able to visit my children whenever I want to.
I\'d like to know more about what happened at today\'s meeting.
I\'m beginning to think there\'s nothing we can do to help Tom.
Tom and Mary were sitting on the steps in front of the library.
Tom asked Mary if she knew where he could buy an assault rifle.
Tom asked Mary to read him the letter she had gotten from John.
Even though Tom still had tears in his eyes, he began to smile.
Everybody in this world has to cope with a lot of difficulties.
I didn\'t have much time so I just skimmed through the article.
I think it\'s time for me to buy my daughter a decent computer.
